704552f-a.text:
South side of Fulton St., east from Arlington Place, B'klyn.
May 14, 1942

P.L. Sperr, photographer
704552f-a.folder: Fulton Street & Arlington Place, Brooklyn, NY

704551f-a.text:
Fulton Street, north side, at Arlington Place. The home of J. Remsen; built in 1716, altered in 1838; later the home of Rem Lefferts;(the maps of 1908, no longer show the house).

1900.

Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
704551f-a.folder: Fulton Street & Arlington Place, Brooklyn, NY
